attributes.name: accounts
attributes.description: Simple representation of the Account (or Link) ResourceType

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Account.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Account.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Account. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: entitlements
attributes.description: extended attribute description

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of the entitlement

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: The display of the entitlement

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The type of the entitlement

subAttributes.name: application
subAttributes.description: The application where this entitlement came from

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Entitlement.

subAttributes.name: accountName
subAttributes.description: The account name this entitlement was sourced from

attributes.name: roles
attributes.description: roles description

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of the role

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: The display of the role

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The type of the role, it, business or otherwise

subAttributes.name: acquired
subAttributes.description: The assigned or detected

subAttributes.name: application
subAttributes.description: The application where this entitlement came from

subAttributes.name: accountName
subAttributes.description: The account name this entitlement was sourced from

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Role.

attributes.name: capabilities
attributes.description: capabilities of this user

attributes.name: riskScore
attributes.description: composite risk score of this user

attributes.name: isManager
attributes.description: is this user a manager?

attributes.name: lastRefresh
attributes.description: when was the last time this user was refreshed?

attributes.name: administrator
attributes.description: The Administrator of the RPA or Service account. This attribute is only applicable if the User type is RPA/Bots or Service.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Administrator of RPA user or Service account.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Administrator of RPA user or Service account.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Administrator of RPA user or Service account.

attributes.name: softwareVersion
attributes.description: The Software Version of the RPA/Bots.

Resources.name: Service Provider Configuration
Resources.description: Schema for representing the service provider's configuration

attributes.name: documentationUri
attributes.description: An HTTP addressable URL pointing to the service provider's human consumable help documentation.

attributes.name: patch
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies PATCH configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported.

attributes.name: etag
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies ETAG configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported.

attributes.name: bulk
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies BULK configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported.

subAttributes.name: maxOperations
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum number of operations.

subAttributes.name: maxPayloadSize
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum payload size in bytes.

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies FILTER options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported.

subAttributes.name: maxResults
subAttributes.description: Integer value specifying the maximum number of resources returned in a response.

attributes.name: changePassword
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies change password options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies sort result options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: Boolean value specifying whether the operation is supported.

attributes.name: authenticationSchemes
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies supported Authentication Scheme properties.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The common authentication scheme name; e.g., HTTP Basic.

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: A description of the authentication scheme.

subAttributes.name: specUri
subAttributes.description: An HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Authentication Scheme's specification.

subAttributes.name: documentationUri
subAttributes.description: An HTTP addressable URL pointing to the Authentication Scheme's usage documentation.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The authentication scheme.  This specification defines the values "oauth", "oauth2", "oauthbearertoken", "httpbasic", and "httpdigest".  REQUIRED.

Resources.name: Schema
Resources.description: Specifies the schema that describes a SCIM Schema

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The unique URI of the schema. When applicable service providers MUST specify the URI specified in the core schema specification

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The schema's human readable name. When applicable service providers MUST specify the name specified in the core schema specification; e.g., User

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The schema's human readable name. When applicable service providers MUST specify the name specified in the core schema specification; e.g., User

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.description: A complex attribute that includes the attributes of a schema

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The attribute's name

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The attribute's data type. Valid values include: 'string', 'complex', 'boolean', 'decimal', 'integer', 'dateTime', 'reference'.

subAttributes.name: multiValued
subAttributes.description: Boolean indicating an attribute's plurality.

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: A human readable description of the attribute.

subAttributes.name: required
subAttributes.description: A boolean indicating if the attribute is required.

subAttributes.name: canonicalValues
subAttributes.description: A collection of canonical values.  When applicable service providers MUST specify the canonical types specified in the core schema specification; e.g., 'work', 'home'.

subAttributes.name: caseExact
subAttributes.description: Indicates if a string attribute is case-sensitive.

subAttributes.name: mutability
subAttributes.description: Indicates if an attribute is modifiable.

subAttributes.name: returned
subAttributes.description: Indicates when an attribute is returned in a response (e.g., to a query).

subAttributes.name: uniqueness
subAttributes.description: Indicates how unique a value must be.

subAttributes.name: referenceTypes
subAttributes.description: Used only with an attribute of type 'reference'. Specifies a SCIM resourceType that a reference attribute MAY refer to. e.g., User

subAttributes.name: subAttributes
subAttributes.description: Used to define the sub-attributes of a complex attribute

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The attribute's name

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The attribute's data type. Valid values include: 'string', 'complex', 'boolean', 'decimal', 'integer', 'dateTime', 'reference'.

subAttributes.name: multiValued
subAttributes.description: Boolean indicating an attribute's plurality.

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: A human readable description of the attribute.

subAttributes.name: required
subAttributes.description: A boolean indicating if the attribute is required.

subAttributes.name: canonicalValues
subAttributes.description: A collection of canonical values.  When applicable service providers MUST specify the canonical types specified in the core schema specification; e.g., 'work', 'home'.

subAttributes.name: caseExact
subAttributes.description: Indicates if a string attribute is case-sensitive.

subAttributes.name: mutability
subAttributes.description: Indicates if an attribute is modifiable.

subAttributes.name: returned
subAttributes.description: Indicates when an attribute is returned in a response (e.g., to a query).

subAttributes.name: uniqueness
subAttributes.description: Indicates how unique a value must be.

subAttributes.name: referenceTypes
subAttributes.description: Used only with an attribute of type 'reference'. Specifies a SCIM resourceType that a reference attribute MAY refer to. e.g., 'User'

subAttributes.name: subAttributes
subAttributes.description: Used to define the sub-attributes of a complex attribute

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The attribute's name

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The attribute's data type. Valid values include: 'string', 'complex', 'boolean', 'decimal', 'integer', 'dateTime', 'reference'.

subAttributes.name: multiValued

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: A human readable description of the attribute.

subAttributes.name: required

subAttributes.name: canonicalValues

subAttributes.name: caseExact
subAttributes.description: Indicates if a string attribute is case-sensitive.

subAttributes.name: mutability

subAttributes.name: returned
subAttributes.description: Indicates when an attribute is returned in a response (e.g., to a query).

subAttributes.name: referenceTypes
subAttributes.description: Used only with an attribute of type 'reference'. Specifies a SCIM resourceType that a reference attribute MAY refer to. e.g., 'User'

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The attribute's name

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The attribute's data type. Valid values include: 'string', 'complex', 'boolean', 'decimal', 'integer', 'dateTime', 'reference'.

subAttributes.name: multiValued

subAttributes.name: canonicalValues

Resources.name: ResourceType
Resources.description: Specifies the schema that describes a SCIM Resource Type

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The resource type's server unique id. May be the same as the 'name' attribute.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The resource type name. When applicable service providers MUST specify the name specified in the core schema specification; e.g., User

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The resource type's human readable description. When applicable service providers MUST specify the description specified in the core schema specification.

attributes.name: endpoint
attributes.description: The resource type's HTTP addressable endpoint relative to the Base URL; e.g., /Users

attributes.name: schema
attributes.description: The resource types primary/base schema URI

attributes.name: schemaExtensions
attributes.description: A list of URIs of the resource type's schema extensions

subAttributes.name: schema
subAttributes.description: The URI of a schema extension.

subAttributes.name: required
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether the schema extension is required for the resource type. If true, a resource of this type MUST include this schema extension and include any attributes declared as required in this schema extension. If false, a resource of this type MAY omit this schema extension.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The unique identifier for the Account object associated with IdentityIQ.

attributes.name: nativeIdentity
attributes.description: The Account unique identifier associated with the native application.

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: The name of the Account, suitable for display to end-users.

attributes.name: instance
attributes.description: The instance identifier of the Account.

attributes.name: uuid
attributes.description: The UUID of the Account.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: The password of the account, used in creating or changing an account password.

attributes.name: currentPassword
attributes.description: The current password of the account, used in changing an account password.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this account is enabled or disabled.

attributes.name: locked
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this account is locked. An account may be unlocked by setting this attribute to false, but can not be locked by setting a false value to true.

attributes.name: lastRefresh
attributes.description: The last refresh date of the Account.

attributes.name: lastTargetAggregation
attributes.description: The date aggregation was last targeted of the Account.

attributes.name: manuallyCorrelated
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this account has been manually correlated in the  UI.

attributes.name: hasEntitlements
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this account has one or more entitlement attributes.

attributes.name: identity
attributes.description: The corresponding User object of the Account.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The User associated with the Account.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Account User.

subAttributes.name: userName
subAttributes.description: The identity name of the Account User. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Account User. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: application
attributes.description: The corresponding Application object of the Account.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The Application associated with the Account.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Account Application.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The name of the Account Application. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: descriptions
attributes.description: A list of localized descriptions of the Entitlement.

subAttributes.name: locale
subAttributes.description: The locale associated with this Entitlement description.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The description in localized form.

attributes.name: displayableName
attributes.description: Displayable Name of the Entitlement

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the Entitlement

attributes.name: application
attributes.description: The corresponding Application object of the Entitlement.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The Application associated with the Entitlement.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Entitlement Application.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The name of the Entitlement Application. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: owner
attributes.description: The owner of the Entitlement

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Entitlement Owner.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Entitlement Owner.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Entitlement Owner. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: requestable
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this entitlement is requestable.

attributes.name: aggregated
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this entitlement has been aggregated.

attributes.name: attribute
attributes.description: Attribute of the Entitlement

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Attribute value of the Entitlement

attributes.name: lastRefresh
attributes.description: The last refresh date of the Entitlement.

attributes.name: lastTargetAggregation
attributes.description: The date aggregation was last targeted of the Entitlement.

attributes.name: classifications
attributes.description: Classifications of this Entitlement.

subAttributes.name: source
subAttributes.description: The source of the ObjectClassification.

subAttributes.name: effective
subAttributes.description: Flag indicating this is an effective Classification.

subAttributes.name: classification
subAttributes.description: Classification of this Object.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The name of the Classification.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Classification.

subAttributes.name: origin
subAttributes.description: The origin of the Classification.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The type of the Classification.

attributes.name: manager
attributes.description: The User's manager. A complex type that optionally allows Service Providers to represent organizational hierarchy by referencing the 'id' attribute of another User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the User's  manager.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the User's manager.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the User's manager. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the application

attributes.name: descriptions
attributes.description: A list of localized descriptions of the Application.

subAttributes.name: locale
subAttributes.description: The locale associated with this Application description.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The description in localized form.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the application

attributes.name: features
attributes.description: Features of the application

attributes.name: owner
attributes.description: The owner of the Application

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Application Owner.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Application Owner.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Application Owner. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: applicationSchemas
attributes.description: List of the application schemas

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Id of the application schema

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: Type of the application schema

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Application Schema.

attributes.name: enableOnReactivation
attributes.description: When user is reactivated, if this account is disabled, when true this setting will automatically enable the account.

attributes.name: accountDeprovisionScenario
attributes.description:
Method by which accounts on this application are Deprovisioned.
Delete Account Immediately = Delete the account Immediately
Disable Account Immediately = Disable the account Immediately
Disable Account Immediately, Wait. Then Delete = Disable the account for X days, then delete the account on that date.

attributes.name: policyName
attributes.description: Name of the Policy

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the Policy Violation

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Status of the Policy Violation

attributes.name: constraintName
attributes.description: The name of the constraint

attributes.name: owner
attributes.description: The owner of the Policy

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Policy Owner.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Policy Owner.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Policy Owner.

attributes.name: identity
attributes.description: The identity of the violation

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the violation identity.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the violation identity.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the violation identity.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the ObjectConfig

attributes.name: objectAttributes
attributes.description: A list of object attributes of the ObjectConfig

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The object attribute name

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The display name of the object attribute

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The type of the object attribute

subAttributes.name: multi
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating this is a multi-valued attribute.

subAttributes.name: defaultValue
subAttributes.description: The default value of the object attribute

subAttributes.name: system
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating this is a system attribute that does not have a source and is not configurable.

subAttributes.name: standard
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating this is a standard attribute (i.e. manager, email, firstname, lastname).

subAttributes.name: extendedNumber
subAttributes.description: Integer value of the extended attribute column number in the database schema.

subAttributes.name: namedColumn
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating this attribute has a named column in the database schema.

subAttributes.name: ruleName
subAttributes.description: Rule used to derive the value. Usually specified when there are no attributeSources defined.

subAttributes.name: groupFactory
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating this attribute can be used in a group factory. Identity attributes only.

subAttributes.name: editMode
subAttributes.description: Enumeration indicating whether this attribute allows modification.

subAttributes.name: attributeSources
subAttributes.description: Sources of values for this atribute. Identity attributes only.

subAttributes.name: instance
subAttributes.description: Optional instance name for template applications.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The name of the attribute on the application.

subAttributes.name: ruleName
subAttributes.description: Rule used to derive the value.

subAttributes.name: key
subAttributes.description: Derived identifier for this source.

subAttributes.name: attributeTargets
subAttributes.description: Targets of this attribute that should receive the value upon attribute synchronization. Identity attributes only.

subAttributes.name: instance
subAttributes.description: Optional instance name for template applications.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The name of the attribute on the application.

subAttributes.name: ruleName
subAttributes.description: Rule used to derive the value.

subAttributes.name: key
subAttributes.description: Derived identifier for this source.

subAttributes.name: provisionAllAccounts
subAttributes.description: Return whether to provision all accounts if an identity has multiple accounts on the target application. Identity attributes only.

attributes.name: workflowName
attributes.description: Name of the Workflow to launch

attributes.name: identityRequestId
attributes.description: Id representing the identity request

attributes.name: workflowCaseId
attributes.description: Id representing the workflow case (a running instance of a workflow)

attributes.name: workflowProcessId
attributes.description: Id representing the workflow monitoring process log

attributes.name: retries
attributes.description: The number of retries performed during the execution of provisioning activities

attributes.name: approvalSet
attributes.description: XML representation of approvals

attributes.name: workflowSummary
attributes.description: XML representation of the workflow summary

attributes.name: input
attributes.description: A list of input attributes of the Launched Workflow

subAttributes.name: key
subAttributes.description: The attribute key

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The attribute value

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The attribute type

attributes.name: output
attributes.description: A list of output attributes of the Launched Workflow

subAttributes.name: key
subAttributes.description: The attribute key

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The attribute value

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The attribute type

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the Workflow

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the Workflow

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the Workflow

attributes.name: handler
attributes.description: Handler of the Workflow

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the User typically used by the user to directly authenticate to the service provider. Each User MUST include a non-empty id value.  This identifier MUST be unique across the Service Consumer's entire set of Users.

attributes.name: externalId
attributes.description: An identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.  OPTIONAL

attributes.name: userName
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the User typically used by the user to directly authenticate to the service provider. Each User MUST include a non-empty userName value.  This identifier MUST be unique across the Service Consumer's entire set of Users.  REQUIRED

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The components of the user's real name. Providers MAY return just the full name as a single string in the formatted sub-attribute, or they MAY return just the individual component attributes using the other sub-attributes, or they MAY return both. If both variants are returned, they SHOULD be describing the same name, with the formatted name indicating how the component attributes should be combined.

subAttributes.name: formatted
subAttributes.description: The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display (e.g., Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III.).

subAttributes.name: familyName
subAttributes.description: The family name of the User, or Last Name in most Western languages (e.g. Jensen given the full name Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III.).

subAttributes.name: givenName
subAttributes.description: The given name of the User, or First Name in most Western languages (e.g. Barbara given the full name Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III.).

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: The name of the User, suitable for display to end-users. The name SHOULD be the full name of the User being described if known

attributes.name: userType
attributes.description: The type of the User, identify the relationship between the organization and the user.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the User's administrative status.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: The User's clear text password.  This attribute is intended to be used as a means to specify an initial password when creating a new User or to reset an existing User's password.

attributes.name: emails
attributes.description: E-mail addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the Service Provider, e.g., bjensen@example.com instead of bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM. Canonical Type values of work, home, and other.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: E-mail addresses for the user. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the Service Provider, e.g. bjensen@example.com instead of bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM. Canonical Type values of work, home, and other.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function; e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred mailing address or primary e-mail address. The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

Resources.name: Alert
Resources.description: Alert object, a generic real time event processing object

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the Alert

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the Alert, auto-generated by the SCIM Server

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: Display name of the Alert

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the Alert

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.description: A list of attributes of the Alert

subAttributes.name: key
subAttributes.description: The attribute key

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The attribute value

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The attribute type

attributes.name: application
attributes.description: The corresponding Application object of the Alert.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The Application associated with the Alert.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Alert Application.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The name of the Alert Application. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: actions
attributes.description: Not empty if action was taken on the Alert

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The type of action performed as a result of the Alert.

subAttributes.name: alertDefinitionName
subAttributes.description: The name of the Alert Definition that triggered the action

subAttributes.name: resultId
subAttributes.description: Typically actions create other objects, a certificationId or workflowId as a result of the action taken

subAttributes.name: result
subAttributes.description: The result

attributes.name: alertDate
attributes.description: The alert date, this could have different meanings based on the type of alert

attributes.name: lastProcessed
attributes.description: The date the last time the alert was processed, this does not indicate the system took action on the alert

attributes.name: nativeId
attributes.description: Unique Identifier of the alert in the native system

attributes.name: targetId
attributes.description: Unique Identifier of the target object which caused the alert

attributes.name: targetType
attributes.description: The type of SailPointObject the target is

attributes.name: targetDisplayName
attributes.description: User friendly display name of the target object

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the TaskResult

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the TaskResult

attributes.name: completionStatus
attributes.description: Completion Status of the TaskResult

attributes.name: launcher
attributes.description: Launcher of the TaskResult

attributes.name: host
attributes.description: Host of the TaskResult

attributes.name: progress
attributes.description: Progress of the TaskResult

attributes.name: targetClass
attributes.description: Target Class of the TaskResult

attributes.name: targetName
attributes.description: Target Name of the TaskResult

attributes.name: terminated
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this TaskResult is terminated

attributes.name: partitioned
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this TaskResult is partitioned

attributes.name: launched
attributes.description: The launched date of the TaskResult

attributes.name: completed
attributes.description: The completed date of the TaskResult

attributes.name: expiration
attributes.description: The expiration date of the TaskResult

attributes.name: verified
attributes.description: The verified date of the TaskResult

attributes.name: percentageComplete
attributes.description: percentage completed of this TaskResult

attributes.name: pendingSignoffs
attributes.description: number of pending signoffs of this TaskResult

attributes.name: taskDefinition
attributes.description: Name of the TaskDefinition of the TaskResult

attributes.name: taskSchedule
attributes.description: Name of the TaskSchedule of the TaskResult

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.description: A list of attributes of the TaskResult

subAttributes.name: key
subAttributes.description: The attribute key

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The attribute value

attributes.name: messages
attributes.description: List of messages of the TaskResult

attributes.name: signoff
attributes.description: Signoff of the TaskResult

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the Role.

attributes.name: displayableName
attributes.description: Displayable Name of the Role.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the Role.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The name associated with the Role Type.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The display name associated with the Role Type.

subAttributes.name: assignmentSelector
subAttributes.description: Flag indicating that roles of this type should have an assignment selector. This is normally false for IT roles and container roles and true for business roles.

subAttributes.name: autoAssignment
subAttributes.description: Flag indicating that roles of this type can be automatically assigned. This is normally false for IT roles and container roles and true for business roles.

subAttributes.name: iiq
subAttributes.description: Flag to indicate that a role should be allowed to contain IdentityIQ properties like capabilities and rights.

subAttributes.name: manualAssignment
subAttributes.description: Flag indicating that roles of this type may be manually assigned. This is normally true for business roles and false for IT and container roles.

subAttributes.name: permits
subAttributes.description: Flag to indicate that roles should have a permits list. Normally this is false for business roles and true for IT roles.

subAttributes.name: requirements
subAttributes.description: Flag to indicate that roles should have a requirements list. Normally this is false for business roles and true for IT roles.

attributes.name: descriptions
attributes.description: A list of localized descriptions of the Role.

subAttributes.name: locale
subAttributes.description: The locale associated with this Role description.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The description in localized form.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Flag to indicate this Role is enabled or active.

attributes.name: activationDate
attributes.description: The date the Role will turn from inactive/disabled to active/enabled.

attributes.name: deactivationDate
attributes.description: The date the Role will turn from active/enabled to inactive/disabled.

attributes.name: owner
attributes.description: The owner of the Role

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Role Owner.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Role Owner.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Role Owner. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: inheritance
attributes.description: Parent Roles this role inherits from.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Role.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Role.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Role. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: requirements
attributes.description: Roles this role requires. This is normally used with business roles to reference IT roles as a way of indicating which IT roles are required to support a business role.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Role.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Role.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Role. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: permits
attributes.description: Roles this role permits. This is normally used with business roles to reference IT roles as a way of indicating which IT roles are allowed to support a business role.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the Role.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the Role.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Role. OPTIONAL and READ-ONLY.

attributes.name: classifications
attributes.description: Classifications of this Role.

subAttributes.name: source
subAttributes.description: The source of the ObjectClassification.

subAttributes.name: effective
subAttributes.description: Flag indicating this is an effective Classification.

subAttributes.name: classification
subAttributes.description: Classification of this Object.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The name of the Classification.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the Classification.

subAttributes.name: origin
subAttributes.description: The origin of the Classification.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The type of the Classification.

attributes.name: adminRole
attributes.description: Indicates whether entitlements from this role need to be applied to an administrative, rather than normal account

attributes.name: policies
attributes.description: Names or IDs of the policies to check, if empty do all active policies

attributes.name: identity
attributes.description: The Identity name or ID check for violations

attributes.name: plan
attributes.description: The provisioning plan applied to the identity

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of the provisioning plan

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The type of the provisioning plan. Either application/xml or application/sailpoint.object.ProvisioningPlan+json

attributes.name: violations
attributes.description: A list of policy violations

subAttributes.name: policyName
subAttributes.description: The name of the policy

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: The description of the violation

subAttributes.name: policyType
subAttributes.description: The type of policy violation

subAttributes.name: constraintName
subAttributes.description: The name of the constraint

subAttributes.name: policyOwner
subAttributes.description: The owner name of the policy

subAttributes.name: entitlements
subAttributes.description: A list of entitlements in violation

subAttributes.name: application
subAttributes.description: The application name where this entitlement came from

subAttributes.name: attribute
subAttributes.description: Attribute of the Entitlement

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Attribute value of the Entitlement

subAttributes.name: leftBundles
subAttributes.description: Roles on the left side of the Policy Violation constraint

subAttributes.name: rightBundles
subAttributes.description: Roles on the right side of the Policy Violation constraint
